statements: SELECT * FROM EmployeePerformanceFeedback;
SELECT employee_name, feedback_text FROM EmployeePerformanceFeedback WHERE feedback_date = '2023-01-15';
SELECT employee_id, feedback_date FROM EmployeePerformanceFeedback WHERE employee_name LIKE 'John%';
SELECT feedback_text FROM EmployeePerformanceFeedback WHERE employee_id = 1001;
SELECT * FROM EmployeePerformanceFeedback ORDER BY feedback_date DESC, employee_name ASC;
SELECT employee_name, feedback_date, feedback_text FROM EmployeePerformanceFeedback WHERE employee_id = 1;
SELECT feedback_text, employee_name, feedback_date FROM EmployeePerformanceFeedback WHERE feedback_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY feedback_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM EmployeePerformanceFeedback WHERE feedback_text LIKE '%positive%' ORDER BY feedback_date ASC;
SELECT employee_id, employee_name, feedback_date FROM EmployeePerformanceFeedback WHERE feedback_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT employee_name, COUNT(employee_id) AS total_feedback_count FROM EmployeePerformanceFeedback GROUP BY employee_name ORDER BY total_feedback_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM Employees;
SELECT employee_name, department FROM Employees;
SELECT employee_id, employee_name FROM Employees WHERE department='Sales';
SELECT * FROM Employees WHERE hire_date > '2021-01-01' ORDER BY hire_date DESC;
SELECT e.employee_name, f.feedback_text, f.feedback_date FROM Employees e JOIN Feedback f ON e.employee_id = f.employee_id;
SELECT * FROM Employees WHERE department = 'IT' ORDER BY employee_name DESC;
SELECT employee_id, employee_name, department FROM Employees WHERE hire_date >= '2020-01-01' ORDER BY hire_date ASC;
SELECT e.employee_name, f.feedback_text FROM Employees e INNER JOIN Feedback f ON e.employee_id = f.employee_id WHERE f.feedback_date BETWEEN '2020-01-01' AND '2021-01-01';
SELECT employee_id, COUNT(feedback_id) AS num_feedbacks FROM Feedback GROUP BY employee_id HAVING num_feedbacks >= 3 ORDER BY num_feedbacks DESC;
SELECT MAX(hire_date) AS latest_hire_date FROM Employees;
SELECT * FROM Employees WHERE department = 'HR';
SELECT employee_name, join_date FROM Employees ORDER BY join_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM PerformanceReviews WHERE rating > 4;
SELECT reviewer_id, reviewed_employee_id, comments FROM Reports WHERE reviewer_id = 101 ORDER BY report_date;
SELECT employee_id, employee_name, department FROM Employees WHERE join_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT * FROM Employees WHERE department = 'IT' ORDER BY employee_name ASC;
SELECT employee_id, employee_name, join_date, department FROM Employees WHERE join_date >= '2021-01-01' ORDER BY join_date DESC;
SELECT employee_name, department, rating FROM Employees JOIN PerformanceReviews ON Employees.employee_id = PerformanceReviews.employee_id WHERE rating > 4 ORDER BY rating DESC;

SELECT e.employee_name, r.report_date, r.comments FROM Employees e JOIN Reports r ON e.employee_id = r.reviewer_id WHERE r.report_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY r.report_date ASC;

SELECT pr.review_id, e.employee_name, pr.review_date, pr.rating, pr.feedback FROM PerformanceReviews pr JOIN Employees e ON pr.employee_id = e.employee_id WHERE pr.rating < 3 ORDER BY pr.review_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Employees;
SELECT first_name, last_name, hire_date FROM Employees ORDER BY hire_date DESC;
SELECT employee_id, department FROM Employees WHERE department = 'Sales';
SELECT review_id, performance_score, review_date FROM PerformanceReviews WHERE performance_score > 80;
SELECT report_name, report_content FROM Reports WHERE report_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY report_date;
SELECT * FROM Employees ORDER BY hire_date DESC, department ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT first_name, last_name, hire_date FROM Employees WHERE department = 'Finance'
SELECT CONCAT(first_name, ' ', last_name) AS full_name, department FROM Employees WHERE hire_date BETWEEN '2020-01-01' AND '2021-01-01'
SELECT r.report_name, r.report_date, e.first_name AS generated_by_name FROM Reports r JOIN Employees e ON r.generated_by = e.employee_id
SELECT pr.review_id, pr.review_date, pr.performance_score, f.feedback_type, f.feedback_notes FROM PerformanceReviews pr JOIN Feedback f ON pr.review_id = f.review_id WHERE pr.performance_score < 80
SELECT * FROM Employee;
SELECT name, department FROM Employee ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT hire_date, name FROM Employee WHERE department = 'Engineering';
SELECT * FROM PerformanceReview WHERE performance_score > 80;
SELECT employee_id, COUNT(review_id) AS num_reviews FROM PerformanceReview GROUP BY employee_id HAVING num_reviews > 2;
SELECT * FROM Employee;
SELECT name, department FROM Employee WHERE department = 'HR';
SELECT name, hire_date FROM Employee ORDER BY hire_date DESC;
SELECT e.name, p.review_date, p.performance_score FROM Employee e JOIN PerformanceReview p ON e.employee_id = p.employee_id;

SELECT e.name, f.feedback_text, f.feedback_date FROM Employee e JOIN PerformanceReview p ON e.employee_id = p.employee_id JOIN Feedback f ON p.review_id = f.review_id WHERE f.feedback_date > '2022-01-01';
